creator: MSPF Bookmark
title: MSPF Bookmark
description: The Bookmark project is designed to make people more aware of library resources. It's a portal built from books that plays audiobooks and provides information about the library.
steps: Source the materials, focusing on reclaimed wood. This may take 1-2 weeks.
Construct the frame in three sections: two columns and a lintel. Each section is a 2'x2'x8' rectangular frame made of 2x4s. Notch grooves for shelves in the columns.
Cut reclaimed wood strips into 2' lengths and nail them horizontally to the outside of the columns and the front of the lintel.

Place the speakers and MP3 player on a shelf at ear height. Drill holes in the cladding for sound to escape. Connect the electronics to an extension cord and run the plug through a hole at the base of the column.
Pre-drill holes around the edges of the plexiglass for attachment.
Transport the pre-constructed columns and lintel. Screw the columns in place and attach the lintel on top. Set up the electronics and fill the shelves with books.
Attach the plexiglass to the front and back of the columns and lintel using washers and screws.
Allow people to interact with the Bookmark to learn about the library.
